text: (Arthata) paigambara, jo tumhala allahace spasta adesa vacuna aikavito, yasathi ki tya lokanna, jyanni imana rakhale ani satkarma kele, tyanna andharakaduna ujedakade anave ani jo manusya allahavara imana rakhela ani satkarma karela, allaha tyala asa jannatamadhye dakhala karela, jicyakhali pravaha vahata aheta, jyata te nehami nehami rahatila. Nihsansaya, allahane tyala sarvanta uttama roji (jivika) de'una thevali ahe
